body_html:
I have created separate files of the patches from PyTorch 0.1.12 applied to 0.2.0 (e02f7bf commit) where I could find them. This is divided into patches by folders or file type where I could group them with minimal number of files. This should be about 80% of the working windows version. So if someone could fix what have been left it would be very appreciated. (I don't have proper toolchain and the system to build and test it for now, sorry)
0001-Win64-README-and-.gitignore.patch.txt
0001-Win64-support-for-lib-TH.patch.txt
0002-Win64-support-for-libshm.patch.txt
0003-Win64-support-for-build-and-test-files.patch.txt
0004-Win64-support-for-Python-scripts.patch.txt
0005-Win64-support-for-lib-nccl.patch.txt
0006-Win64-support-for-lib-THPP.patch.txt
0007-Win64-support-for-.cwrap-files.patch.txt
0008-Win64-support-for-FindCUDA.cmake.patch.txt
0009-Win64-support-for-csrc.patch.txt
0010-Win64-support-for-lib-ATen.patch.txt
0012-Win64-support-for-lib-THC.patch.txt
0013-Win64-support-for-lib-THCS.patch.txt
0014-Win64-support-for-lib-THCUNN.patch.txt
0015-Win64-support-for-lib-THD.patch.txt
0016-Win64-support-for-lib-THNN.patch.txt
0017-Win64-support-for-lib-THS.patch.txt

body:
I have created separate files of the patches from PyTorch 0.1.12 applied to 0.2.0 (e02f7bf8a344b04f51527f233bd4727b6ebb1ebe commit) where I could find them. This is divided into patches by folders or file type where I could group them with minimal number of files. This should be about 80% of the working windows version. So if someone could fix what have been left it would be very appreciated. (I don't have proper toolchain and the system to build and test it for now, sorry)
[0001-Win64-README-and-.gitignore.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217414/0001-Win64-README-and-.gitignore.patch.txt)
[0001-Win64-support-for-lib-TH.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217417/0001-Win64-support-for-lib-TH.patch.txt)
[0002-Win64-support-for-libshm.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217428/0002-Win64-support-for-libshm.patch.txt)
[0003-Win64-support-for-build-and-test-files.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217422/0003-Win64-support-for-build-and-test-files.patch.txt)
[0004-Win64-support-for-Python-scripts.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217416/0004-Win64-support-for-Python-scripts.patch.txt)
[0005-Win64-support-for-lib-nccl.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217419/0005-Win64-support-for-lib-nccl.patch.txt)
[0006-Win64-support-for-lib-THPP.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217427/0006-Win64-support-for-lib-THPP.patch.txt)
[0007-Win64-support-for-.cwrap-files.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217423/0007-Win64-support-for-.cwrap-files.patch.txt)
[0008-Win64-support-for-FindCUDA.cmake.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217430/0008-Win64-support-for-FindCUDA.cmake.patch.txt)
[0009-Win64-support-for-csrc.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217426/0009-Win64-support-for-csrc.patch.txt)
[0010-Win64-support-for-lib-ATen.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217415/0010-Win64-support-for-lib-ATen.patch.txt)
[0012-Win64-support-for-lib-THC.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217425/0012-Win64-support-for-lib-THC.patch.txt)
[0013-Win64-support-for-lib-THCS.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217418/0013-Win64-support-for-lib-THCS.patch.txt)
[0014-Win64-support-for-lib-THCUNN.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217429/0014-Win64-support-for-lib-THCUNN.patch.txt)
[0015-Win64-support-for-lib-THD.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217420/0015-Win64-support-for-lib-THD.patch.txt)
[0016-Win64-support-for-lib-THNN.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217424/0016-Win64-support-for-lib-THNN.patch.txt)
[0017-Win64-support-for-lib-THS.patch.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1217421/0017-Win64-support-for-lib-THS.patch.txt)
